## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5169fcc0ce37e587c7680742027ad143ea18826d2290cbe5a8c9bdb69095fef0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'com.immutable.unitysdk' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
